name: BraveShine
description:
Description
Made by our team - ACKGame.
In the psychedelic pipeline, bravely pursue the end.

It's for you. The theme of this time is him
We made this game for Epic Game Jam 2022. The theme is AS ABOVE SO BELOW.

Up, down, left and right
wherever you choose
You have only one way
Just Go Forward!!!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Our Team
Designer: Sky.ang (qq: 806922675)
Programmer: Tiax (ahucd.cn)
Artist: Ahu (ziwuzhiliao@gmail.com)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Input
A or ←: turn left
D or →: turn right

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
List any content that was created before the jam.
None.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?
Unreal Engine 5.0.3
